text: Po miloserdiyu, vnushennomu tebe Allakhom, ty [, Mukhammed,] prostil im. Yesli by ty byl surovym i zhestokoserdnym, to oni nepremenno pokinuli by tebya. Tak prosti zhe ikh sam, prosi Dlya nikh proshcheniya [u Allakha] i sovetuysya s nimi o delakh. Kogda ty reshilsya na chto-libo, upovay na Allakha. Voistinu, Allakh lyubit upovayushchikh
